title: Test: Route Handlers Are Dispatchers
Test: Service Layer Independence
Test: Anti-Pattern Example
Test: Middleware Order Matters
content:
Test fixture for middleware patterns.

```swift
// ✅ Correct order
router.add(middleware: DependencyInjectionMiddleware(dependencies: deps))
router.add(middleware: RequestLoggingMiddleware())
router.add(middleware: AuthMiddleware(token: token))
```
